hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Mughira bin Shu`ba:I was in the company of Allah's Messenger (ï·º) on one of the journeys and he went out to answer the call of nature (and after he finished) I poured water and he performed ablution; he washed his face, forearms and passed his wet hand over his head and over the two Khuff (socks made from thick fabric or leather)
